GOOD NEWS fellow pervs, Studio T-Rex and Director Raika Ken announced the film adaptation of the manga Nanao " 3Piece (Master_ Piece)". The release is scheduled for the end of may 2019. - hentaiforme

@Greatest Showman
It's a continuation of a separate story, there's already an entire volume published centered around this blonde milf & her twin daughters. There's also a separate story involving a black haired milf, and her two daughters (one older, one younger). Both stories are part of the 3 Piece(s) series in the master piece volume/tankoubon.  It's easy to keep the stories straight: either the women are all blonde, or all black-haired. Still fabulous art either way.
